content: gilmore girls cup cozy this craft or that comfy worsted minis 43 yds or worsted weight yarn rico metallic thread size 4 3 5 mm needle a size 6 4 mm needle b choose appropriate needle type per the preferred method to knit in the round bor st marker optional size 8 75 circumference x 4 5 deep gauge 22 sts x 32 row in st st = 4 pattern cut 1 yard of yarn or metallic thread to sew button when knitting is done set aside using needle a co 48 sts loosely join in the round being careful not to twist place bor st m ribbing round choose 1 *k2 p2* or *k2tbl p2* or *k1 p1* or *k1tbl p1* repeat to end ribbing is knitter s choice repeat ribbing round for a total of 5 rounds change to needle b body k every round until work measures approx 3 change back to needle a repeat ribbing round that was chosen for a total of 5 rounds bind off loosely or use a stretchy bind off method cut yarn leaving a tail weave in ends using the 1 yard that was set aside sew luke s diner button to front enjoy abbreviations bor = beginning of round p = purl sts = stitches co = cast on repeat = repeat st st = stockinette stitch k = knit st = stitch tbl = through the back loop m = marker pattern based on gg fan day cup cozy by julianne pardon diesch her pattern includes embellishing ideas this pattern is for personal use only not for resale ©2024 unwind yarn shop llc all rights reserved 9912 e grand river brighton mi 810-229-5579 www unwindyarnshopmi com
